reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Great professor! Very clear lectures and helpful during office hours.

reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Good explanations, but sometimes a bit fast-paced.

reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Decent lectures, but not very engaging.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: Material is hard, and lectures are confusing.

reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: Very knowledgeable and approachable.

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: Passionate about the subject and makes history interesting.

reviews.subject: Literature
reviews.review: Engaging lectures, but the reading load is heavy.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Interesting topics but sometimes hard to follow.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Very interactive classes and thoughtful discussions.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: Lectures are too theoretical and not practical.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Very knowledgeable, but sometimes biased in opinions.

reviews.subject: Engineering
reviews.review: Good content but not the best at explaining.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: Excellent professor! Very engaging.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Very passionate about art, but lectures can be slow.

reviews.subject: Geology
reviews.review: Amazing professor! Field trips are the best part.

reviews.subject: Statistics
reviews.review: Content is challenging, but the professor is supportive.

reviews.subject: English
reviews.review: Great discussions, but a lot of writing assignments.

reviews.subject: Anthropology
reviews.review: Very knowledgeable and makes anthropology fascinating.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Engaging lectures, but concepts are difficult to grasp.

reviews.subject: Astronomy
reviews.review: Wonderful professor! Makes complex topics understandable.
